content.body:
the agenda deadline is in [21 hours](https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?p0=179&iso=20260228T10&msg=TC39%20Submission%20deadline)

there's still plenty of space on [the agenda](https://github.com/tc39/agendas/blob/main/2026/03.md)

and 30 people will be there, so please feel encouraged to add more topics!

content.body: I have another I could add (https://github.com/jasnell/proposal-transfer-protocol) but I already have several on the agenda and don't want to be the only one talking ;-) ... happy to add it tho if there's interest
